ingredients.ingredient: ½ (6.75 ounce) package dried rice noodles
8 cooked medium shrimp, sliced in half lengthwise
3 tablespoons fish sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut noodles into shorter pieces after cooking for easier rolling
Arrange shrimp halves with the pink side facing outward for visual appeal
Serve spring rolls immediately after making—they're best fresh and chewy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Spring rolls are simple but require finesse with rice wrappers. Work gently to avoid tearing. The fish sauce is the only dressing needed to highlight the fresh ingredients inside.
